title: 打招呼和闲聊
situation: You run into a colleague at the office. You want to greet them and make small talk.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.translation: Hi! How have you been lately?

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 我也很好，谢谢。今天忙吗？
turns.pinyin: Wǒ yě hěn hǎo, xièxiè. Jīntiān máng ma?
turns.translation: I'm good too, thanks. Busy today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.pinyin: Hái hǎo, yǒu jǐ ge huì yào kāi.
turns.translation: Not too bad, have a few meetings.
